name: quick-mark
tagline: Convert lightweight markup to an HTML form.
body:
# quick-mark package Convert lightweight markup to an HTML form. ##### Example Markup 
  <
  First Name?
  Last Name?
  >
  blue<
  Suffix...
  Go.
  HINT: Click "Go" when ready. 
  >
##### See it in action! ![See it in action!](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/resistdesign/quick-mark/master/screenshot.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
